lead_paragraph: ALI--Muhammad. On behalf of Billie Jean King and the Board of Trustees and staff of the Women's Sports Foundation, we want to express our heartfelt condolences to Laila Ali and her family on the loss of her beloved father, Muhammad Ali. Muhammad Ali was a true champion in the boxing ring and a courageous hero, recognized world-wide for his wit and his willingness to speak up for peace and equality. Muhammad Ali is truly the greatest and he will be missed by all. 1/3
